kpi.name: M8006C166

kpi_info.title: Additional EPS Bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Receipt of a S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi.kpi_alias: Additional EPS Bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3
